After other’s bidding, you can get (≈ %v: After other’s bidding, you can get (≈ %value% BNB)
After a successfully bid, you can claim: After a successfully bid, you can claim the reward of the Galaxy at 24:00 UTC every day
If other people bid it while you have it: If other people bid it while you have it, you can only claim the reward from when you take it to the time when you lose it.
%name% successfully bid the galaxy with: %name% successfully bid the galaxy with %price% BNB at %time% UTC
To upgrade, you need to sacrifice planet: To upgrade, you need to sacrifice planets of the same quality and grade
When all buildings' grade is 1 level abo: When all buildings' grade is 1 level above the planet grade, the planet can be upgraded
Energy building grade does not meet the: Energy building grade does not meet the standard
The upgrade process will last for 6 hour: The upgrade process will last for 6 hours, during which the planet will not be able to operate. Do you want to continue?
Commander! Please create an identity for: Commander! Please create an identity for yourself
Create an identity will consume 100 DSG,: Create an identity will consume 100 DSG, the system will automatically exchange BNB for this amount of DSG using a real-time exchange rate.
6~30 characters (Support English, Chines: 6~30 characters (Support English, Chinese,Punctuation Marks and numbers)
BnbRegister: The account wallet balance is insufficient to pay the %DSG% DSG required to create an identity. Do you agree to pay %BNB% BNB to create an identity?
You don't have a planet yet, please acqu: You don't have a planet yet, please acquire a planet to start your Galaxy journey
You will have a chance to get: You will have a chance to get
Purchase succeeded, try your luck now!: Purchase succeeded, try your luck now!
The planet is under cultivating, it has: The planet is under cultivating, it has no capacity yet
Building cannot work as usual while upgr: Building cannot work as usual while upgrading
The buildings’ grade of the planet to be: The buildings’ grade of the planet to be upgraded does not meet the standard
No data, Go to open the black hole: No data, Go to open the black hole
OpenMysteryBoxBtnDesc1: Deploy to Planet Alliance in one click
CultivationRuleDesc1: *Cultivation level 1-6: Success rate is high, with small amount of combat attribute BUFF, losing a battle will not lead to downgrading, and consumption costs will not be refunded.
CultivationRuleDesc2: *Cultivation level 7-14: Success rate is medium, with significant combat attribute BUFF, losing a battle will lead to 1 level downgrade, and consumption costs will not be refunded.
CultivationRuleDesc2-1: Losing a battle will lead to downgrading to lv 14, and consumption costs will not be refunded.
CultivationRuleDesc3: *Cultivation level 15-20: Success rate is low, with substantial combat attribute BUFF.
CultivationRuleDesc3-1: Losing a battle will lead to downgrading to lv 14, and consumption costs will not be refunded.
CultivationRuleDesc4: *The higher the rarity of a planet, the higher the base cost
Changes in troops after cultivation: Changes in troop types after cultivation
CultivationConfirmDesc: Current cultivation success rate is %rate%, %value% Do you want to confirm cultivation?
(Skip will not affect the result of this: (Skip will not affect the result of this battle)
Influenced by the black hole's magnetic: Influenced by the black hole's magnetic field
OpenMysteryBoxDesc1: The higher the discovery level, the higher the chance of getting high-quality planets
OpenMysteryBoxDesc1-2: Get 5 planets per discovery base and a chance to get planets of different quality
OpenMysteryBoxDesc2-1: You can get 5 planets per discovery, and you have a chance to get
OpenMysteryBoxDesc2-1-1: You have a chance to get
OpenMysteryBoxDesc2-2: quality planets at the current discovery level
GuideMysteryIndexStep0: commander! Welcome to Discovery, here are 3 different black holes producing planets of ordinary to rare quality. The higher the quality, the better the comprehensive properties of the planet.
GuideMysteryIndexStep1: Now let's also get to the first discovery - the worn-out black hole to get the planet.
GuideMysteryStateStep0: Here is a detailed description of the currently discovered black hole, click Next.
GuideMysteryStateStep1: Click to discover now, get 5 planets immediately after consuming the cost, start our planetary journey~
GuideMysteryListStep0: Congratulations! Get five great planets, each of which may vary in quality and race. Next let's deploy to the League of Planets.
GuidePlanetUpgrade: Upgrading planets can build higher-level buildings and improve the basic attributes of planets.
GuidePlanetGrow: Cultivation can greatly improve its combat power and production capacity, including the growth of various attributes.
SurprisesDesc1: There will be additional surprises to discover
Spacemen are the mysterious advanced cre: Spacemen are the mysterious advanced creatures of galaxies. They have the supreme racial civilization, and their highly advanced technology and spiritual abilities give them absolute strength in space. Spacemen have AOE damage skills, and their comprehensive combat power is more balanced than the other two groups.
With three weapons and agility, they can: With three weapons and agility, they can climb over obstacles and pierce attack 3 targets (100%, 50%, 30%).
Guard Nolin is the sentinel of the Space: Guard Nolin is the sentinel of the Spacemen group who can pierce attack two targets.
They move very fast, with purify capabil: They move very fast, with purify capability.
With the talent of camouflage, they can: With the talent of camouflage, they can avoid most attacks on the battlefield. Their MISS value is extremely high.
Same as Shuttler I, they can also pierce: Same as Shuttler I, they can also pierce attack 3 targets (100%, 50%, 30%).
The most loyal warrior in the Spacemen g: The most loyal warrior in the Spacemen group, their mechanical gun emits frozen eggs, which can freeze one enemy unit.
With handheld Energy Cannon, they can en: With handheld Energy Cannon, they can enable the shield magnetic field for two rounds.
The lowest-level combat unit of the Spac: The lowest-level combat unit of the Spacemen group, but their faith will never change. Meteor hammer is their only attack weapon.
Lunatic from purgatory, their skin is th: Lunatic from purgatory, their skin is thick and has a high ES (9 ES).
They are also a high-defence fighter of: They are also a high-defence fighter of the Spacemen; they can advance the front-line defence for the troops.
Aerial combat unit, and low -level comba: Aerial combat unit, and low -level combat units
Aerial combat unit with super long-range: Aerial combat unit with super long-range attack capability
The giant devil whose energy has been se: The giant devil whose energy has been sealed, moves very slowly, they can cause damage to a single-target.
An aerial combat unit can deliver a free: An aerial combat unit can deliver a freezing effect with very low DEF.
They look silly, but with a highly flexi: They look silly, but with a highly flexible body, they can attack and repel enemies.
Absolute defense force on the ground, wi: Absolute defense force on the ground, with the hard shell, they are fearless on the battlefield.
Simple-minded but absolutely brutal comb: Simple-minded but absolutely brutal combat unit. They can attack 3 units in a V shape.
Proficient in swordsmanship, they can qu: Proficient in swordsmanship, they can quickly cut the enemy, who can only hear the sound but can't see the shadow of the sword, with pierce attack capability (100%, 50%, 30%)
Move slowly, their attack comes with a f: Move slowly, their attack comes with a freezing effect
With mutant arms storing high damaged mi: With mutant arms storing high damaged missiles, they can launch a missile attack to blast 4 squares surrounding them.
The walking dead in the dark. Close atta: The walking dead in the dark. Close attack, with ES last for 2 rounds.
Lord from purgatory, its red body, repre: Lord from purgatory, its red body, represents the blood of all enemies. With X-type 5 points attack.
The only short-distance flight unit of t: The only short-distance flight unit of the Spacemen with regular attacks.
The highest weight unit of the Spacemen,: The highest weight unit of the Spacemen, it can control the mind and limit the enemy's thinking. They can repel the unit behind the main unit and have immunity to various types of effects.
The spikes on their body are not weapons: The spikes on their body are not weapons, but their nuclear explosion energy on the chest can deliver immeasurable damage.
The most flexible combat unit in the air: The most flexible combat unit in the air, they can deliver frost effect on the enemy.
Small but extremely brutal, with purify: Small but extremely brutal, with purify capability.
Like other ancient dragons, they can bri: Like other ancient dragons, they can bring devastating abnormal weather, and can freeze one enemy unit.
There is flame energy from space energy: There is flame energy from space energy in their body, and they can shoot massive fire and burn the enemy to ashes. They can launch a missile attack to blast 4 squares surrounding them.
A close relative of the War Cancer moves: A close relative of the War Cancer moves slowly, with a conventional attack unit.
Interstellar guards composed of the Unit: Interstellar guards composed of the United Legion roam in galaxies. Sophisticated mechanical capabilities and high-tech technology provide absolute combat protection, and they have long-range tactical capabilities, which can give them defense against Zerg. Productivity and building HP are relatively low due to their roam.
1st generation mecha hunter, with high-s: 1st generation mecha hunter, with high-speed fire bursting ability to pierce attack 3 targets (100%, 50%, 30%).
The strongest combat unit of the Terran,: The strongest combat unit of the Terran, with great attack damage capability.
As a single burst mecha, they can repel: As a single burst mecha, they can repel the enemy.
Shields are always the key to their surv: Shields are always the key to their survival against all kinds of attacks. They can repel enemies, but move slowly.
The Terran close combat mecha can attack: The Terran close combat mecha can attack over obstacles.
The optimized mech launches missile atta: The optimized mech launches missile attacks and bombards 4 surrounding areas.
As the 2nd generation mecha hunter with: As the 2nd generation mecha hunter with higher damage, they can launch missile attacks and bombards 4 surrounding areas.
They have stronger defense and destructi: They have stronger defense and destructive power but move slowly.
Roam through the battlefield with the en: Roam through the battlefield with the enabler of special serum, they can easily kill enemies, with high SPR but low ACC.
Weird hexagonal combat machine with sing: Weird hexagonal combat machine with single-target attack only.
With high-temperature jet flame, they ca: With high-temperature jet flame, they can continually burn the enemy for 4 rounds.
Gareth is definitely a game opener, it c: Gareth is definitely a game opener, it can attack enemy units for 3 squares.
The 3rd generation mecha hunter, they ar: The 3rd generation mecha hunter, they are closer to human form, with extremely high damage and they can launch missile attacks and bombards 4 surrounding areas.
Ultra-mobility combat machine, but can o: Ultra-mobility combat machine, but can only attack one enemy unit.
Ultra-mobility combat machine, they can: Ultra-mobility combat machine, they can quickly approach the enemy and cause confusion, but their damage power is extremely low.
A mechanical unit that can remotely prov: A mechanical unit that can remotely provide HP regeneration for units from its own side.
Combat units that can attack 2 squares: Combat units that can attack 2 squares
With high-precision tech weapons, violen: With high-precision tech weapons, violent bombing lasts 4 rounds.
Loaded with thermal imaging equipment, t: Loaded with thermal imaging equipment, they can accurately snipe enemy units.
The most mysterious combat unit of Terra: The most mysterious combat unit of Terran, no enemy can survive under their feet. They can approach the enemy and release high-damage bombs for 2 rounds.
The Terran aircraft carrier with its ene: The Terran aircraft carrier with its energy-collecting cannon, can effectively repel enemies and deal damage.
First strike fighter, can quickly approa: First strike fighter, can quickly approach the enemy on top to deliver harassment strikes. They also have a purify function.
Medical mission flight unit, which can r: Medical mission flight unit, which can remotely regenerate one HP for its own side.
High-mobility fighters in the air with e: High-mobility fighters in the air with extremely long-range attack capability.
The escort of human command ships can re: The escort of human command ships can restore 9 squares on its own side.
As infrared medic, they can restore 1 HP: As infrared medic, they can restore 1 HP of one's own units at close range on the battlefield.
Infrared semi-automatic mecha warriors a: Infrared semi-automatic mecha warriors are the best choice for the strike force, with high SPR and low ACC.
Infrared semi-automatic mecha warriors are the best choice for the strike force.
Can easily overcome obstacles and attack: Can easily overcome obstacles and attack enemy units.
An immobile attack machine, with a very: An immobile attack machine, with a very thick HP, very small ATK, but with a repel effect.
The oldest troop vanguard of Terran can: The oldest troop vanguard of Terran can repel enemy units behind the main attack target.
They have a very high MISS value, which: They have a very high MISS value, which is also the foundation of being a ranger, but they have low damage and with single-target repel effect.
The energy medicine tube stored at any t: The energy medicine tube stored at any time can quickly restore 1 HP to your own combat units.
A brutal race evolved from interstellar: A brutal race evolved from interstellar creatures, with super high damage power, their innate weapons and armor are comparable to other races, and devoting spirit makes them extremely strong and deadly. But no AOE and short-range attack ability are their weak points.
They have a hard shell, and can quickly: They have a hard shell, and can quickly shuttle through the battlefield.
With multiple eyes and tentacles, they c: With multiple eyes and tentacles, they can quickly detect enemies and conduct sneak attacks, and with repel effect.
They have a thick shell, very high HP an: They have a thick shell, very high HP and DEF, and can imprison 1 enemy combat unit.
They can imprison 1 enemy combat unit.
Although they have 4 legs, they cannot m: Although they have 4 legs, they cannot move while attacking, and they use the venom in their mouth to attack the enemy.
Area attack can attack enemy units up to: Area attack can attack enemy units up to 9 squares
A fish variant that can fly low in the a: A fish variant that can fly low in the air, with relatively low ATK.
Slow-moving Zerg unit, attack method: co: Slow-moving Zerg unit, attack method: conventional attack
A giant mouth in the shape of a piranha: A giant mouth in the shape of a piranha can imprison 1 enemy combat unit.
With two super-heavy pincers, they move: With two super-heavy pincers, they move slowly, but with repel effect.
With the spiky tentacles, they can put e: With the spiky tentacles, they can put enemies into their mouths and attack enemy unit 3 squares away.
It can suddenly spring from the tunnel,: It can suddenly spring from the tunnel, catch the opponent by surprise, and piercing attack 3 targets
As mutated species from the void, they a: As mutated species from the void, they are enemy's nightmare. They can use venom missiles to bomb 4 targets around.
The name has nothing to do with its figu: The name has nothing to do with its figure. They can regenerate 1 HP with their side at close range.
Zerg's giant close combat unit, can impr: Zerg's giant close combat unit, can imprison 4 surrounding squares.
Air unit that can imprison enemy units.
As close-range combat unit, they can imp: As close-range combat unit, they can imprison one front and one back enemy unit.
The heroic and invincible Zerg warrior c: The heroic and invincible Zerg warrior can attack the target one square behind the main attacking unit.
Air Scout with ranged attack capability.
Ground scout, fast moving, rough skin an: Ground scout, fast moving, rough skin and thick HP.
Strike unit, can attack 3 enemy units in: Strike unit, can attack 3 enemy units in a V shape.
The explosive bomb on their back can be: The explosive bomb on their back can be precisely guided for long-range attacks.
A fast-attacking unit on the ground, the: A fast-attacking unit on the ground, they can regenerate 1 HP with their side at long range.
Made entirely of quantum energy, belongs: Made entirely of quantum energy, belongs to tank warriors, they can imprison 1 enemy target
They can pull enemy units and hit them,: They can pull enemy units and hit them, causing damage.
With mutant cells, they can rampage in b: With mutant cells, they can rampage in battle, their attack range is 2 squares.
They have a hard shell, and they can qui: They have a hard shell, and they can quickly shuttle through the battlefield, and imprison enemy unit.
With an extremely hard horn, they can de: With an extremely hard horn, they can deal a lot of damage when approaching enemies, but have low ACC.
After inviting a friend to register a ch: After inviting a friend to register a character and open a blind box, you can get 5% of the cost of each blind box opened by your friend as a reward
Alliance looting order: looting in seque: Alliance looting order: looting in sequence according to the serial number
After stopping work, resources will not: After stopping work, resources will not be produced or consumed. Do you want to stop working?
The planet is already in the alliance: The planet is already in the alliance
Enter the planet token to search: Enter the planet token to search
Planets in the Planet Alliance cannot be: Planets in the Planet Alliance cannot be cultivated
Planet already has max strengthen grade: Planet already has max strengthen grade
The planet is under upgrading, cannot be: The planet is under upgrading, cannot be upgraded now.
Only when the occupancy rate of the plan: Only when the occupancy rate of the planet grid reaches 20% can it be upgraded
RegistrationCheckBalance: Registration failed, please check if your balance of DSG or BNB is sufficient
InQueueHint: There is a mission queue on the current planet. Joining the Planetary Alliance will cancel all mission queues for this planet. Are you sure you want to select this planet?
Click to repair the durability of the pl: Click to repair the durability of the planet.
After the battle, the planet will lose i: After a battle, planets suffer durability loss, and need immediate repair to continue their planet exploration.
Here are the details of the battle repor: Here is the detailed report of the current battle.
Here is the basic information of the opp: Here is the basic information about the enemy side.
Here are all HP values of our camp. If i: Here is the overall HP value of our side. We lose the battle if it is empty.
Click to view details of the battle.
Commander! The latest battle situation o: Commander! Check out the latest battle report of the alliance here.
The user needs to pop up the rule introd: For the first 2 interstellar explorations of users, there will be a pop-up rule introduction.
Commander, you are ready for interstella: Commander, you are ready for interstellar exploration.
Click to add all available planets.
You need at least 2 more planets to expl: You need at least 2 more planets to explore. Please add more planets. The more you add, the greater your chance for successfully looting resources.
Click to select a planet and join the al: Click to pick a planet to join the alliance.
Here are the resources and combat power: Shown here are the resources and combat effectiveness of the Planet Alliance, as well as the available assets contained.
Interstellar exploration needs to be com: You need 5 planets to start interstellar exploration, and through interstellar exploration, you can discover more resources.
Click to enter the Star Alliance to star: Click to enter the Planet Alliance to start interstellar exploration.
Here is the total capacity and resources: Here are the total capacity and resources of all your planets.
All right, deployment is over! Here is t: Alright, the deployment is complete! Here is the battle’s attack order.
Now start to arrange the formation, drag: Now start to arrange the lineup, drag battle units and place them on our battle area, and a sound deployment position is a key to victory.
The basic attributes and capability cobw: The basic attributes and capability cobweb diagram of the current battle unit, you can improve your capability through upgrading.
The operation animation of the current c: The illustrative rendering of the current battle unit, you can see the battle mode.
Click to learn more about battle units.
This is the list of combat units you can: Here is the list of battle units you can currently send out.
In the battle array interface, the enemy: In the battle lineup interface, our side and the enemy side are located in two battle areas, and you can deploy battle units strategically to win the battle.
Cultivation can greatly improve its comb: Cultivation can significantly improve its combat effectiveness and capacity, including the growth of various attributes.
Upgrading the planet can build higher-le: After planet upgrading, you can build higher-grade buildings to improve the basic attributes of the planet.
Start to create the first building of th: Start to create the first building of the planet, drag a building to the right place on the board.
This is the energy tank of the planet. I: This is the energy tank of the planet, the core building for resource management. It can supplement resources and store the resources that come from interstellar lootings.
The construction list will show the unit: The construction list will show the units that can be built, including their consumption, type, capacity, etc.
Each planet has a built grid, and the nu: Every planet has its grids for construction, and the number of the grids is linked to its quality. A sound construction strategy is also a key to winning.
The left navigation can manage the upgra: You can use the left navigation bar to manage the upgrading, cultivation and lineup arrangement of the planet.
Each planet has its own production capac: Every planet has its capacity and resources, which come from the construction strategy of buildings.
Now let's start running the planet~: Now let's start running the planet.
The additional attribute information of: The additional attribute information of the planet is closely related to the operation and battle of the whole planet, which can be improved through cultivation.
Here is the attribute information of the: Here is the attribute information of the planet, which is determined by its quality, and the number of grids also determines the number of constructions.
Great. Congratulations on your first pla: Great! Congratulations on your first planet. This is the dominant race of the planet, and each race has its characteristics.
Click the button to start the star sea i: Click the button to start your galaxy journey now!
Commander! To start a journey to the pla: Commander! You need to have your own planet to start your galaxy journey. The box below has planets of different qualities inside, and the quality determines the comprehensive strength.
Click to enter the next step: Click to enter the next step
Here is the battle arrangement of both s: Here is the battle arrangement of both sides and the display of combat effects.
Well, the latest combat effectiveness wi: Well, the latest combat effectiveness will be displayed after deployment! Click and finish to end the deployment.
planetTipsFail1: This building cannot be placed in grids
planetDragBuildingDesiredGrid: Drag a building to a grid
planetResourcesProducedPlanetaryBuilding: Function: Store all resources produced by planet buildings
planetDetailsType1: Store all resources produced by planet buildings
GuideModalText: Do you want to continue the last tutorial next time you log in?
BuffBonustitle: Planet breeding and building BUFF buildings can provide bonuses
One-click replenishment of storage tank: Replenish energy for storage tank in one click to deploy resources faster.
One-click repair durability, you can rep: Regenerate END in one click to regenerate all buildings' END on a planet faster.
Simultaneous jobs (upgrades/builds): Number of queues that can work concurrently (upgrade/construct)
You are not yet a VIP, you can get more: You are not VIP yet, please upgrade to VIP to get more benefits
Income: 100% for the first %num% times a: Income: 100% for the first %num% times and 50% for the last time
Joining the task queue costs resources a: Join the task queue costs resources and cannot be cancelled. Do you confirm to join the current task
This feature is a VIP benefit, please up: This function is a VIP benefit, please upgrade to VIP.
Storage jars cannot be destroyed when th: The storage tank cannot be destroyed when there is only one
The number of cellars must be less than: The number of cellars cannot exceed the number of storage tanks
The resource has reached the upper limit: The resource has reached the upper limit and cannot be recharged
guidePlanetStep_1: The blocks built here, each planet has a different number of blocks depending on the quality. Each planet has its own production capacity and resources, which are derived from the construction strategy of the building.
guidePlanetStep_2: In order to increase your efficiency, each planet will have basic buildings. Click to see building details.
guidePlanetStep_3: Here is the basic information of buildings, each building has its own unique properties.
guidePlanetStep_5: This is the build/upgrade queue for planets, click to build new buildings.
guidePlanetStep_6: Click the + sign to place the building on the grid automatically or drag the building directly to the grid.
guidePlanetStep_7: After confirming the current building, click OK to build to start building.
guidePlanetStep_8: The buildings you just built will be queued here, so you can better control the time. Of course, there are only 2 queues by default. If you want more queues, you can upgrade to VIP~
guidePlanetStep_9: For better interstellar exploration, we must deploy combat troops. Click to enter the battle formation.
Become a VIP to continue exploring: Become a VIP to continue exploring
This planet is already in the alliance: This planet is already in the alliance
ExploreRules1: * Exploration Difficulty determines your resource reward coefficient and your opponents' level in a skirmish. If you lose a skirmish, some of your mined resources will be deducted, and you can reduce the loss by placing a cellar on the planet.
ExploreRules3: * Based on your positioning, proper management of planet buildings and placement of troop types will lead to better results.
ExploreRules4: * Proper management of planets will strengthen your CE.
ExploreRules5: * Combat deployment strategies will also make you stand out.
ExploreRules6: Exploration Time: 4 hours (It is compulsory and cannot be cancelled)
PlayRules1: * Planet Alliance is the basic unit in Galaxy Exploration and Occupy Star. One Planet Alliance consists of five and only five planets.
PlayRules2: * With Galaxy Exploration, all planet buildings will be in working state so that resource buildings will mine resources, and troops training bases will train troops, etc. Meanwhile, each building will also consume resources to maintain its working state.
PlayRules3: * It should be noted that choosing different difficulties will give you different resource reward coefficients, and you will meet different levels of enemy alliances in Galaxy Exploration's skirmish. The winner can loot more resources, and the defeated will lose part of its resources to the winner.
PlayRules4: * The first 1.5 hours of Galaxy Exploration is the protection period, and in the rest 2.5 hours, you will enter a war space where skirmish is waiting for you.
PlayRules5: * During a skirmish, planets in a Planet Alliance will be randomly selected for battle, and various resources will be gained/lost base on battle results. The defeated will suffer END loss.
PlayRules6: * Exploration time is 4 hours. Start your Galaxy Exploration now!
Accumulated by all Lords of this galaxy: Accumulated by all Lords of this galaxy in history
won the auction with %num%BNB and became: Won the auction with %num%BNB and became the master of the system
Of Which, %num1% BNB will be given to th: Of Which, %num1% BNB will be given to the previous galaxy lord, and %num2% BNB will go to the Rewards Pool
Estimated amount of BOX received in 24 h: Estimated amount of BOX received in 24 hours
Alliance_Boot1: Commander! Welcome to the interstellar space, here are your alliance positions (planetary alliances), they will produce resources and hostile battles for you. The alliance consists of 5 planets, let's get the planets first.
Alliance_Boot2: In the discovery, you can get planets of various qualities, click let's start!
Alliance_Boot3: Excellent! The planetary alliance has been deployed. Before starting the exploration, we must effectively manage the planets on the alliance in order to obtain victory and more resources in the exploration.
Alliance_Boot4: Click the current planet to start building planets.
Alliance_Boot5: Click the button to start building planets.
Alliance_Boot6: Very good! We have completed some preparations before the exploration. The exploration needs to be composed of 5 planets. Click to explore
Alliance_Boot7: Explore different difficulties, there will be different encounters and receipts, choose the difficulty you want to challenge!
Alliance_Boot8: Exploration is about to begin, you can choose to explore immediately, or deploy battles to other planets. Only perfect battle deployments will give you an advantage in exploration. The next step will be the commander's choice
Alliance_Boot9: Commander! The latest alliance battle situation has been generated, click to view.
Alliance_Boot10: After the battle, the planet will have a loss of durability, and it needs to be repaired immediately to ensure planet exploration.
Alliance_Boot11: Commander, you will now dominate the galaxy.
Your Alliance is incomplete and may not: Your Alliance is not complete, you may not be able to explore, are you sure
StopWorkWarn: Your Alliance is in the process of Exploration. Change Alliance will stop the Exploration and all the resources obtained will be lost. Are you sure you want to confirm?
Select planets from list to join Allianc: Select planets from list to join Alliance
UpErr1: Upgrade Planet failed, make sure the following conditions are met
UpErr2: 1. Every square on your planet needs to be filled with buildings
UpErr3: 2. All your buildings need to be upgraded to the Planet's current level
UpErr4: The following units have not reached the Planet's level
UpErrBtn3: Check out which buildings are eligible
InviteDesc1: After your invited friends create a digital identity, you will get:
InviteDesc1-1: 1. 3% of your friends' $BOX transaction fee as a reward.
InviteDesc1-2: 2. 5% of the cost of your friends' Blind Boxes as a reward.
occupationRules: With the tickets purchased with BOX, you can fight other Planet Alliance to Occupy Star and obtain BOX output! Note that different Star No. Come with different weights of BOX rewards. It would help if you chose wisely a suitable star according to your capability.
GalaxyDesc1: After successfully bidding a Galaxy, you can get
GalaxyDesc1-2: 30% of the Occupy Star challenge fee paid by other gamers
GalaxyDesc1-3: If your galaxy is bid and obtained by someone else, you will get back your initial bidding amount, plus an extra 15% in BNB, which will be automatically sent to your BNB Chain address, and you will receive a notification in the message bar.
InboxTypeDesc1: Congratulations, Commander! You have successfully bid on galaxy '%galaxy%' at %price%. Galaxy Lord can get rewards from the galaxy and stars. Check out the details!
InboxTypeDesc2: Commander, the galaxy '%galaxy%' you bid at %oldPrice% was auctioned by gamer %address% at %price% at %time%, who became the new Galaxy Lord. %getAmount% of the auction price is your earning and has been sent to your address.
InboxTypeDesc2-2: You have received a total reward of %reward% during your Galaxy Lordship.
InboxTypeDesc3: Congratulations, Commander! With strategy and strength, you have successfully occupied %star% in the '%galaxy%' galaxy at %time% and become the new Star-Lord. Keeping the lordship will give you continuous rewards.
InboxTypeDesc3-2: Tip: Improving Planet Alliances' CE is the only way to gain the upper hand in the battle for Stars!
InboxTypeDesc4: Commander, %star% in your galaxy '%galaxy%' was occupied by gamer %address% %power% at %time%, who became its new Star Lord
InboxTypeDesc4-2: You have occupied the star for %time% , and obtained %reward% cumulatively
InboxTypeDesc7-1-1: View battle reports and battle replays
Notification for bidding Galaxy Lordship: Notification for bidding Galaxy Lordship successfully
Galaxy Lordship was bid and obtained by: Galaxy Lordship was bid and obtained by others
Notification when a Star is occupied: Notification when a Star is occupied
http-error-network: Network error. Please try again later
http-error-200003: Unable to find base building number
http-error-200004: The Planetary Alliance did not start working
http-error-200006: The number of planetary alliances is less than 3
http-error-200007: The planet is being upgraded and cannot work
http-error-200008: The planet is hardening cannot work
http-error-200009: Planet upgrade failed, insufficient building level
http-error-200010: Failed to upgrade the planet, has reached the maximum level
http-error-200011: The planet enhancement record does not exist
http-error-200012: The planet upgrade record does not exist
